thread.title: Russia asks public to name new nukes

title: Russia asks public to name new nukes
text:
Russia asks public to name new nukes Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:05 
Russia has unveiled the names for a new generation of nuclear-powered missiles touted by President Vladimir Putin as invincible after more than seven million people took part in a quirky public vote organised by the Russian military.   
Russia has unveiled the names for a new generation of nuclear-powered missiles touted by President Vladimir Putin as invincible after more than seven million people took part in a quirky public vote organised by the Russian military.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/23/russia-asks-public-to-name-new-nukes?videoId=411463735&videoChannel=13422
